org.pikater.web.experiment.server

Class SlotConnections

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.experiment.server.SlotConnections

  • public class SlotConnections
extends java.lang.Object

    Maps connected slots of a given ExperimentGraphServer.
    In each pair of connected slots, one has to be an input slot and the other an output slot. Each slot belongs to exactly one box. A box may have multiple slots defined (either input or output).

    All slots ARE REQUIRED to be represented by exactly one Slot instance in the whole web application.

    Author:
    SkyCrawl

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(BoxSlot endPoint1,
           BoxSlot endPoint2)
        Connects the given 2 endpoints/slots, if possible, and throws exceptions otherwise.
        No need to distinguish between input/output endpoints.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(Slot slot1,
              Slot slot2)
        Disconnects the given slots, if they were previously connected. Throws exceptions otherwise.
        Input/output slots are not distinguished in this method. Both can be passed.

      • areSlotsConnected

        A self explanatory method.
        No need to distinguish between input/output slots.
